verses.1: Amaute in kei tungah, “ Topaʼ inn ah pai ni,” hong cih uh ciangin kei ka kipak hi.
verses.2: Jerusalem aw, na kulh kongpi sungah kote hong tungin ka ding khinta uh hi.
verses.3: Jerusalem khuapi pen Israel-te tungah thu a kipiak sa bangin Topaʼ tungah lungdamna a ko dingin Topaʼ minamte, Israel minamte, a hong pai tohna, khuapi lian tawh a kibangin a kibawl, kip takin a kilam bikbek khuapi ahi hi.
verses.5: Davidʼ innkuanteʼ kumpi tokhom, thukhen nading kumpi tokhomte, tua lai ah kikoih hi.
verses.6: Jerusalem khuapi, a nopsak nading thu ngen unla, “Nang hong itte a daupai tahen.
verses.7: Na khua sungah lungnopna om henla, na galvilna tausangteʼ huam sungah lungmuanna om tahen,” ci-in ngen un.
verses.8: Sanggamte le kikholhpihte ka khualna-in, “Jerusalem in nopna om tahen,” ka ci ding hi.
verses.9: Topa eiteʼ Pasianʼ inn ka khualna-in nangma hoih nading thu ka ngen ding hi.
